statements.statement: SELECT DISTINCT spref.SubjectProductRefId , spref.PropertyValue , spref.TopFlag , spref.SortNo , spref.BuyType , spref.IsStarProduct , spref.ShowTime , spref.IsShow , sp.ProductNo , sp.ProductName , spextend.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , sp.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , sp.DepartmentNo , spB.BrandNo , spB.BrandCnName , spB.BrandEnName, spref.DateCreate FROM SWfsSubjectProductRef AS spref ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) ON spref.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpBrand AS spB ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.BrandNo = spB.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spref.CategoryNo in @SCategoryNo AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND spref.TypeFlag = 0 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 #if($CategoryNo !='') and sp.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($BrandNo!='') and sp.BrandNo =@BrandNo #end #if($Keyword!='') and (sp.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sp.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sp.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($GenderStyle!='') and sp.ProductSex = @GenderStyle #end ORDER BY spref.SortNo ASC , spref.DateCreate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT spref.SubjectProductRefId , spref.PropertyValue , spref.TopFlag , spref.SortNo , spref.BuyType , spref.IsStarProduct , spref.ShowTime , spref.IsShow , sp.ProductNo , sp.ProductName , spextend.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , sp.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , sp.DepartmentNo , spB.BrandNo , spB.BrandCnName , spB.BrandEnName, spref.DateCreate FROM SWfsSubjectProductRef AS spref ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) ON spref.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpBrand AS spB ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.BrandNo = spB.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spref.CategoryNo = @SCategoryNo AND spref.TypeFlag = 0 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 #if($CategoryNo !='') and sp.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($BrandNo!='') and sp.BrandNo =@BrandNo #end #if($Keyword!='') and (sp.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sp.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sp.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($GenderStyle!='') and sp.ProductSex = @GenderStyle #end ORDER BY spref.SortNo ASC , spref.DateCreate DESC

SELECT sp.ProductNo , sp.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , spextend.Status , sp.ProductName , spextend.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , sp.DepartmentNo , spB.BrandNo , spB.BrandCnName , spB.BrandEnName FROM SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpBrand AS spB ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.BrandNo = spB.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spextend.TypeFlag = 2 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 AND spextend.IsOutside = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT spref.ProductNo FROM dbo.SWfsSubjectCategory (NOLOCK) AS sc , SWfsSubjectProductRef (NOLOCK) AS spref WHERE sc.CategoryNo = spref.CategoryNo AND SubjectNo = @SubjectNo AND spref.ProductNo=sp.ProductNo AND spref.TypeFlag = 0 ) AND (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend(NOLOCK) WHERE sp.ProductNo = ProductNo AND DataState = 1 AND DisabledState = 0 #if($IsShelf!='') AND PcSaleState = @IsShelf #else AND PcSaleState IN (2,3) #end ) >= 1 #if($CategoryNo !='') and sp.CategoryNo like @CategoryNo + '%' #else AND SUBSTRING(sp.CategoryNo,1,3) IN @CategoryList #end #if($BrandNo!='') and sp.BrandNo =@BrandNo #end #if($Keyword!='') and (sp.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sp.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sp.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($GenderStyle!='') and sp.ProductSex = @GenderStyle #end

SELECT sp.ProductNo , sp.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , spextend.Status , sp.ProductName , spextend.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , sp.DepartmentNo , spB.BrandNo , spB.BrandCnName , spB.BrandEnName FROM SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpBrand AS spB ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.BrandNo = spB.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spextend.TypeFlag = 2 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT spref.ProductNo FROM dbo.SWfsSubjectCategory (NOLOCK) AS sc , SWfsSubjectProductRef (NOLOCK) AS spref WHERE sc.CategoryNo = spref.CategoryNo AND SubjectNo = @SubjectNo AND spref.ProductNo=sp.ProductNo AND spref.TypeFlag = 0 ) #if($ProductNo !='') AND sp.ProductNo IN @ProductNo #end

SELECT ssc.CategoryName , sspr.ProductNo , ssc.CategoryNo , spB.BrandEnName , spB.BrandCnName , sp.ProductName FROM SWfsSubjectCategory AS ssc ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SWfsSubjectProductRef AS sspr ( NOLOCK ) ON sspr.CategoryNo = ssc.CategoryNo INNER JOIN SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) ON sspr.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ON sp.ProductNo=spextend.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpBrand AS spB ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.BrandNo = spB.BrandNo WHERE spextend.TypeFlag = 2 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 AND ssc.SubjectNo = @SubjectNo ORDER BY ssc.SortNo , sspr.SubjectProductRefId DESC

SELECT $SubjectNo AS SubjectNo , SpRef.SubjectProductRefId , SpRef.PropertyValue , SpRef.TopFlag , SpRef.SortNo , SpRef.BuyType , SpRef.IsStarProduct , SpRef.ShowTime , SpRef.IsShow , SpRef.CategoryNo , sp.ProductNo , sp.ProductName , spextend.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , sp.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , spB.BrandNo , spB.BrandCnName , spB.BrandEnName FROM SWfsSubjectProductRef AS SpRef ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) ON SpRef.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpBrand AS spB ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.BrandNo = spB.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spref.TypeFlag = 0 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 AND SpRef.CategoryNo IN ( SELECT CategoryNo FROM SWfsSubjectCategory(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SWfsSubject(NOLOCK) ON SWfsSubjectCategory.SubjectNo = SWfsSubject.SubjectNo WHERE SWfsSubject.SubjectNo = @SubjectNo AND SWfsSubject.SubjectTemplate = 5 AND Status = 1 AND DateEnd > GETDATE() )

select SP.ID,SP.ShowTime,SP.ShowProductPicFileNo,SP.ProductNo,P.ProductName,SP.SubjectNo,SP.SubjectCategoryNo,SP.Type, CONVERT(varchar(100), SP.ShowTime, 23) as DateDay from SWfsSubjectSpikeProductManage(nolock) as SP left Join SpProduct(nolock) as P on P.ProductNo= SP.ProductNo where SP.Status=1 and DATEDIFF(month,SP.ShowTime,@Date)=0 #if($ProductNoName!='') and (P.ProductNo=@ProductNoName or P.ProductName like '%'+@ProductNoName+'%') #end #if($SubjectNo!='') and SP.SubjectNo=@SubjectNo #end order by SP.ShowTime ASC

SELECT skuPri.MarketPrice , skuPri.GoldPrice AS SellPrice , skuPri.PlatinumPrice , skuPri.DiamondPrice , skuPri.StandardPrice AS LimitedPrice , skuPri.OutletPrice AS LimitedVipPrice , skuPri.DiscountOutlet AS DiscountRate, sku.PcShelfDate AS DateShelf, sku.PcSaleState AS IsShelf , sku.DisabledState, skuPri.SkuNo, sku.ProductNo FROM SpfSkuExtend AS sku ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfSkuPrice AS skuPri ( NOLOCK ) ON skuPri.SkuNo = sku.SkuNo WHERE sku.DataState = 1 AND sku.PcSaleState IN(2,3) AND sku.DisabledState = 0 AND ProductNo IN @ProductNo ORDER BY skuPri.OutletPrice ASC,sku.SkuId DESC

SELECT skuPri.MarketPrice , skuPri.GoldPrice AS SellPrice , skuPri.PlatinumPrice , skuPri.DiamondPrice , skuPri.StandardPrice AS LimitedPrice , skuPri.OutletPrice AS LimitedVipPrice , skuPri.DiscountOutlet AS DiscountRate, sku.PcShelfDate AS DateShelf, sku.PcSaleState AS IsShelf , sku.DisabledState, skuPri.SkuNo, sku.ProductNo FROM SpfSkuExtend AS sku ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfSkuPrice AS skuPri ( NOLOCK ) ON skuPri.SkuNo = sku.SkuNo WHERE sku.PcShowState = 1 AND sku.DataState = 1 AND sku.PcSaleState = 2 AND sku.DisabledState = 0 AND ProductNo IN @ProductNo ORDER BY skuPri.MarketPrice DESC,sku.SkuId DESC

SELECT skuPri.MarketPrice , skuPri.GoldPrice AS SellPrice , skuPri.PlatinumPrice , skuPri.DiamondPrice , skuPri.StandardPrice AS LimitedPrice , skuPri.OutletPrice AS LimitedVipPrice , skuPri.DiscountOutlet AS DiscountRate, sku.PcShelfDate AS DateShelf, sku.PcSaleState AS IsShelf , sku.DisabledState, skuPri.SkuNo, sku.ProductNo FROM SpfSkuExtend AS sku ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfSkuPrice AS skuPri ( NOLOCK ) ON skuPri.SkuNo = sku.SkuNo WHERE sku.DataState = 1 AND ProductNo IN @ProductNo ORDER BY skuPri.OutletPrice ASC,sku.SkuId DESC

SELECT spRef.SubjectProductRefId , spRef.PropertyValue , spRef.TopFlag , spRef.SortNo , spRef.BuyType , spRef.IsStarProduct , spRef.ShowTime , spRef.IsShow , spRef.DateCreate , sp.CategoryNo , sp.ProductNo , sp.ProductName , spextend.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , sp.ProductModel AS GoodsNo , spB.BrandNo , spB.BrandCnName , spB.BrandEnName , spref.DateCreate FROM SWfsSubjectProductRef AS spRef ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) ON spref.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpBrand AS spB ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.BrandNo = spB.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spRef.CategoryNo = @CategoryNo AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND spRef.TypeFlag = 0 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 AND spRef.IsShow = 1 AND spRef.ShowTime <= @ShowTime AND spextend.TypeFlag=2 AND ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend WHERE sp.ProductNo = ProductNo AND DataState = 1 AND DisabledState = 0 AND PcSaleState = 2 AND PcShowState = 1 ) >= 1 ORDER BY SortNo ASC , spRef.DateCreate DESC

SELECT sp.* FROM SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND spextend.DataState = 1 AND spextend.ProductNo = @ProductNo

SELECT spref.ProductNo FROM dbo.SWfsSubjectCategory (NOLOCK) AS sc , SWfsSubjectProductRef (NOLOCK) AS spref INNER JOIN SpProduct AS sp ( NOLOCK ) ON sp.ProductNo = spref.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend AS spextend ( NOLOCK ) ON spextend.ProductNo = sp.ProductNo WHERE spextend.TypeFlag = 2 AND spref.IsShow = 1 AND spextend.IsOutside=1 AND sc.CategoryNo = spref.CategoryNo AND SubjectNo = @SubjectNo AND spref.TypeFlag = 0

select ISNULL(brandNo,'0') AS BrandNo,ISNULL(BrandEnName,'0') AS BrandEnName,ISNULL(BrandCnName,'0') AS BrandCnName,SubjectNo from SWfsSubject with(nolock) left outer join SpBrand(nolock) on convert(nvarchar(255),SWfsSubject.BrandContent)=SpBrand.brandNo where SubjectNo in @SubjectNo

SELECT spextend.ProductNo FROM SpfProductExtend AS spextend WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE spextend.DataState = 1 AND spextend.TypeFlag = 2 AND spextend.Status = 1 AND spextend.ProductNo IN ( SELECT DISTINCT spref.ProductNo FROM dbo.SWfsSubjectCategory AS sc , SWfsSubjectProductRef AS spref WHERE sc.CategoryNo = spref.CategoryNo AND SubjectNo = @SubjectNo AND spref.TypeFlag = 0 AND spref.IsShow = 1 )
SELECT DISTINCT SkuNo, ProductNo FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend(NOLOCK) WHERE ProductNo IN @ProductNo

SELECT sub.SubjectNo , sub.SubjectName , sub.SubjectEnName , sub.SubjectTemplate , sub.Gender , sub.AdPic , sub.BelongsSubjectPic , topic.PreheatTime , sub.DateBegin , sub.DateEnd , topic.TopCreateTime , sub.DateCreate , sub.IPhoneText , sub.FlapPic , sub.IPhonePic , sub.TitlePic2 , topic.StExpand AS SWfsAolaiNoticePageId, fa.WebPic, fa.WebUrl, fa.Type, sub.SubjectTemplate, sub.IsAudited, sub.Status, sub.SubjectType, sub.IsRelated, sub.ChannelNo FROM SWfsSubjectFocusArea (NOLOCK) AS fa LEFT JOIN SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub ON fa.SubjectNo = sub.SubjectNo LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SWfsSubjectTopExpand (NOLOCK) AS topic ON topic.SubjectNo = sub.SubjectNo WHERE fa.showdate = CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 23) AND fa.status = 1 ORDER BY fa.sort ASC , fa.showdate DESC
